original_title: Der Hafenpastor und das Blaue vom Himmel
overview: In the third film of the successful series, Jan Fedder is back as a Pastor Book with body and soul. To look after human destinies in St. Pauli, he sees as his life's task, no matter what milieu they come from or what confession they belong. The fallen and stranded people challenge him this time especially.
title: Der Hafenpastor und das Blaue vom Himmel
